message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm looking for a price around $22,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $19,000 to make this a win-win.  This product will bring you a lot of value, I'm confident.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
